SENT.plain: A 16-year-old woman presented with Marfan syndrome and bilateral ectopia lentis
The surgical treatment including removal of the crystalline lens and implantation of an iris-supported intraocular lens in both eyes at a week interval
Postoperatively, the biomicroscopic examination showed total pupil closure bilaterally
After the topical tropicamide treatment, the pupil returned to normal shape
